short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Fun Game To Play When Bored

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tile-based colorful game about merging tiles to level up to higher tiles. Earn the highest score and compare with a leaderboard. Satisfying animations, clean UI, easily fun for everyone!
